name: Grey's Anatomy: The Video Game
description:
Play as all your favorite characters and perform life-or-death
operations in this all-new Grey's Anatomy story.
Immerse yourself
for the first time in this all-new Grey's Anatomy story written in
collaboration with the TV show writers. Play as your favorite characters
as you strive to save Seattle Grace Hospital from its worst crisis yet.
Influence the outcome of the storyline and perform all the multi-step
surgeries that the series is known for.
